blogPost.excerpt: Gumroad University is a curated collection of interviews, challenges, guides, documentation, and workshops, designed to help creators get inspired, create something fantastic, and bring it to market sucessfully.
blogPost.body: Gumroad University is a curated collection of interviews, challenges, guides, documentation, and workshops, designed to help creators get inspired, create something fantastic, and bring it to market sucessfully.
blogPost.title: Gumroad University - A guided tour of our best resources by creators for creators
blogPost.author: Philip Kiely

localize.description: GumRoad大学是一个精心策划的采访、挑战、指南、文档和研讨会的集合，旨在帮助创作者获得灵感，创造一些奇妙的东西，并成功地将其推向市场。
localize.tagline: 由创作者为创作者导览我们最好的资源

localize.description: GumRoad大學是一個精心策劃的採訪、挑戰、指南、文檔和研討會的集合，旨在幫助創作者獲得靈感，創造一些奇妙的東西，併成功地將其推向市場。
localize.tagline: 由創作者爲創作者導覽我們最好的資源

previous.excerpt: Insights report and database of 60+ hand-curated profitable design apps. This database and report will save you hours of researching and collecting data about design apps
previous.title: Profitable design apps database - Database of 60+ hand-curated profitable design apps

localize.tagline: 包含60多个手工策划的有利可图的设计应用程序的数据库

localize.tagline: 包含60多個手工策劃的有利可圖的設計應用程序的數據庫

next.excerpt: "Every day, it gets a little easier. But you gotta do it every day, that's the hard part". Everyday helps you break goals down into tasks we can execute on every day, colouring our beautiful board whilst forming new habits, ultimately reaching our goals.
next.title: Everyday 2.0 - Simple & beautiful habit tracker for the Web, iOS & Android

localize.description: “每一天，事情都会变得容易一些。但你必须每天都去做，这是最难的部分。”每天帮助你将目标分解成我们每天可以执行的任务，在形成新习惯的同时，给我们美丽的黑板涂上色彩，最终实现我们的目标。
localize.tagline: 简单美观的网络、iOS和Android习惯跟踪器

localize.description: “每一天，事情都會變得容易一些。但你必須每天都去做，這是最難的部分。”每天幫助你將目標分解成我們每天可以執行的任務，在形成新習慣的同時，給我們美麗的黑板塗上色彩，最終實現我們的目標。
localize.tagline: 簡單美觀的網絡、iOS和Android習慣跟蹤器
